content: “Ethereum Mexico” is a 1-day conference in Mexico City on September 30th for 1200 attendees. Talks and workshops in Spanish will cover web3, the Ethereum ecosystem, and future updates. We’ll reach out to universities and communities across Mexico to expand our reach. A Quadratic Funding Round with the EF will secure more funding for public goods. Aligns with EF’s mission to strengthen Ethereum’s foundations, educate, and build communities.
